# Markdown Docs

## Components

- [GlobalHeader Example](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/_examples/stories/GlobalHeader.stories.md): Developers building internal Workday applications will likely not need to create this component.
- [Accessible Tooltip Examples](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/_examples/stories/Tooltips.stories.md): 
- [Canvas Kit Examples](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/_examples/stories/mdx/CompoundComponent.md): 
- [ContextualHelp](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/_examples/stories/mdx/ContextualHelp.md): 
- [Canvas Kit Examples](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/_examples/stories/mdx/CookieBanner.md): 
- [Canvas Kit Density Examples](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/_examples/stories/mdx/Density.md): Although we currently don't support a density system, it's common practice to provide varying
- [Canvas Kit Examples](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/_examples/stories/mdx/FormsWithFormik.md): 
- [Canvas Kit Examples](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/_examples/stories/mdx/Layouts.md): Below are layout examples to reference as you build your own. For more in-depth information on our
- [MediaModal](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/_examples/stories/mdx/MediaModal.md): 
- [Canvas Kit Action Bar](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/action-bar/stories/ActionBar.md): Action Bar is a [compound component](/getting-started/for-developers/resources/compound-components/)
- [Canvas Kit Avatar](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/avatar/stories/avatar/Avatar.md): 
- [Canvas Kit Count Badge](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/badge/stories/CountBadge.md): `CountBadge` provides a quantity-based summary with dynamic values.
- [Canvas Kit Banner](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/banner/stories/Banner.md): `Banner` is a [compound component](/getting-started/for-developers/resources/compound-components/)
- [Canvas Kit Breadcrumbs](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/breadcrumbs/stories/Breadcrumbs.md): Breadcrumbs is a
- [Canvas Kit Button](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/button/stories/button/Button.md): Clickable button elements that extend the native `` element with Canvas styling.
- [Canvas Kit Hyperlinks](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/button/stories/button/Hyperlink.md): Clickable anchor elements that extend the native `` element with Canvas styling.
- [Canvas Kit Card](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/card/stories/card.md): A Card is a preview that serves as an entry point to more detailed information. Card is a
- [Canvas Kit Checkbox](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/checkbox/stories/Checkbox.md): Checkboxes allow a user to select zero, one, or multiple values from a predefined list of 7 or less
- [Canvas Kit Collection API](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/collection/stories/mdx/Collection.md): The Collection API is a system of models and behaviors for creating lists and grids. For example,
- [Canvas Kit Color Input](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/color-picker/stories/color-input/ColorInput.md): Color Input lets a user specify a color by entering a hexadecimal value into a text field.
- [Canvas Kit Color Preview](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/color-picker/stories/color-preview/ColorPreview.md): Color Preview displays a color swatch.
- [Combobox](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/combobox/stories/Combobox.md): Combobox is an _abstract_ compound component - it should not be used on its own, but used as a base
- [Compound Component Utilities](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/common/stories/mdx/CompoundComponentUtilities.md): The following utilities are used to create and compose
- [Responsive Styling](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/common/stories/mdx/Responsive.md): 
- [Canvas Kit Theming Guide](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/common/stories/mdx/Theming.md): 
- [Canvas Kit Dialog](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/dialog/stories/Dialog.md): A Dialog component is a non-modal type of dialog that will not render the rest of the page inert
- [Canvas Kit Expandable](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/expandable/stories/Expandable.md): `Expandable` is a compound component that creates a header to expand or collapse related content.
- [Canvas Kit Form Field](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/form-field/stories/FormField.md): FormField allows users to wrap input components to make them accessible. You can customize the field
- [Assets](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/icon/stories/Assets.md): Assets are graphics which help communicate meaning or highlight areas of interaction to our users.
- [Box](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/layout/stories/Box.md): `Box` is a primitive component that provides a common, ergonomic API around Canvas design tokens. It
- [Canvas Kit Flex](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/layout/stories/Flex.md): `Flex` is a low-level layout component that provides a common, ergonomic API for building
- [Canvas Kit Grid](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/layout/stories/Grid.md): `Grid` is a low-level layout component that provides a common, ergonomic API for building
- [Canvas Kit Loading Dots](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/loading-dots/stories/LoadingDots.md): Loading Dots make users aware that content is currently being loaded, processing, or that change
- [Canvas Kit Menu](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/menu/stories/Menu.md): `Menu` displays a list of options when triggered by an action or UI element like an icon or button.
- [Canvas Kit Modal](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/modal/stories/Modal.md): A Modal component is a type of Dialog that renders a translucent overlay that prevents user
- [Canvas Kit Pagination](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/pagination/stories/pagination.md): `Pagination` is a
- [Canvas Kit Popups](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/popup/stories/Popup.md): A "popup" is a classification for a type of stacked UI element that appears "on top" of statically
- [Canvas Kit Radio](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/radio/stories/Radio.md): 
- [Canvas Kit Segmented Control](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/segmented-control/stories/SegmentedControl.md): 
- [Canvas Kit Select](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/select/stories/Select.md): Select inputs allow users to choose one option from a list of items or type a matching option.
- [Canvas Kit Skeleton](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/skeleton/stories/Skeleton.md): A Skeleton is a low-fidelity visual placeholder that represents the loading of interface elements
- [Canvas Kit Status Indicator](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/status-indicator/stories/StatusIndicator.md): 
- [Canvas Kit Switch](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/switch/stories/Switch.md): Switch is a selection control that is used to switch between two potential states.
- [Canvas Kit Table](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/table/stories/Table.md): `Table` is a simple styled compound component that renders a
- [Canvas Kit Tabs](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/tabs/stories/Tabs.md): `Tabs` is a [compound component](/getting-started/for-developers/resources/compound-components/)
- [Testing](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/testing/stories/Testing.md): A package that provides components and utilities for testing
- [Canvas Kit Body Text](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/text/stories/BodyText.md): `BodyText` provides a simple way to render body-level text with built-in support for Canvas type
- [Canvas Kit Heading](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/text/stories/Heading.md): `Heading` provides a simple way to render heading-level text with built-in support for Canvas type
- [Canvas Kit Label Text](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/text/stories/LabelText.md): 
- [Canvas Kit Subtext](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/text/stories/Subtext.md): `Subtext` provides a simple way to render subtext-level text with built-in support for Canvas type
- [Canvas Kit Text](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/text/stories/Text.md): `Text` provides an ergonomic API for rendering text. It includes built-in support for Canvas type
- [Canvas Kit Title](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/text/stories/Title.md): `Title` provides a simple way to render title-level text with built-in support for Canvas type
- [Canvas Kit Text Area](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/text-area/stories/TextArea.md): Text Areas allow users to enter and edit multiple lines of text.
- [Canvas Kit Text Input](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/text-input/stories/TextInput.md): Text Inputs allow users to enter words or characters without styling.
- [Canvas Kit Toast](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/toast/stories/toast.md): `Toast` is a [compound component](/getting-started/for-developers/resources/compound-components/)
- [Tokens](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/tokens/stories/Tokens.md): 
- [Canvas Kit React Tooltips](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/react/tooltip/stories/Tooltip.md): A Tooltip component that renders information/text when the user hovers over an element. A tooltip is

## Preview Components

- [FormLibraryExample](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/preview-react/_examples/stories/mdx/FormLibraryExample.md): 
- [Avatar](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/preview-react/avatar/stories/Avatar.md): 
- [Divider](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/preview-react/divider/stories/Divider.md): A `Divider` segments and visually organizes content.
- [Canvas Kit Information Highlight](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/preview-react/information-highlight/stories/InformationHighlight.md): A container to call out important information on a page or a section of a page that the user should
- [Canvas Kit Loading Sparkles](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/preview-react/loading-sparkles/stories/LoadingSparkles.md): `LoadingSparkles` is a loading animation that makes users aware an AI operation is in progress.
- [Canvas Kit MultiSelect](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/preview-react/multi-select/stories/MultiSelect.md): MultiSelect inputs allow users to choose multiple options from a list of items.
- [Canvas Kit Pill](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/preview-react/pill/stories/Pill.md): `Pill`s are static or interactive indicators that allow users to input, filter, or label
- [Canvas Kit Radio](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/preview-react/radio/stories/Radio.md): Radio Buttons allow a user to select one value from a predefined list of 7 or fewer options.
- [Canvas Kit Segmented Control](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/preview-react/segmented-control/stories/SegmentedControl.md): Segmented Control is a
- [Canvas Kit Select](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/preview-react/select/stories/Select.md): 
- [Canvas Kit Side Panel](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/preview-react/side-panel/stories/SidePanel.md): `SidePanel` is a collaspible container that anchors to the left or right side of the screen.
- [Canvas Kit Status Indicator](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/preview-react/status-indicator/stories/StatusIndicator.md): Status Indicators help the user quickly identify the status of a task, action, or page element.

- [Style Props](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/docs/mdx/style-props/STYLE_PROPS.md): Style props provide a common, ergonomic API for modifying a component's styles by passing styles

- [Style Props Deprecation Overview](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/docs/mdx/style-props/stylePropsMigrationOverview.md):

## Styling

- [Create Styles](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/styling/stories/mdx/CreateStyles.md): The primary utility function is the `createStyles` function. It makes a call to the `css` function
- [How To Customize Styles](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/styling/stories/mdx/CustomizingStyles.md): There are multiple ways to customize styles for components within Canvas Kit. The approach you
- [Converting from @emotion/styled](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/styling/stories/mdx/FromEmotion.md): The most difficult part of understanding styling without Emotion's runtime is the mindset shift. You
- [Merging Styles](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/styling/stories/mdx/MergingStyles.md): 
- [Canvas Kit Styling](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/styling/stories/mdx/Overview.md): 
- [Create Stencil](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/styling/stories/mdx/Stencils.md): Stencils are a reusable function that returns `style` and `className` props in an object. A Stencil
- [Canvas Kit Styling Utilities](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/styling/stories/mdx/Utilities.md): A collection of helpful functions for styling with `@workday/canvas-kit-styling`. While they're
- [Why Canvas Styling](https://workday.github.io/canvas-kit/llm/markdown/styling/stories/mdx/WhyCanvasStyling.md): This package contains everything needed to create CSS styling. This styling package contains a
